items.sentence: Tom successfully convinced many people that he possessed paranormal powers.
The roller coaster broke down and Tom was stuck at the top for eight hours.
Tom wants to know when you'll go to Australia and how long you'll be there.
I'm finally able to understand what's interesting about professional shogi.
My neighbors started arguing about three hours ago and they're still at it.
I see no reason that we need to wait until Tom gets here to start drinking.
Have you seen my keys? I thought that I left them on the dining room table.
The train that just left the station was the one we were supposed to be on.
I spent over an hour with a customer, but she ended up not buying anything.
The small fork is for your salad, and the large one is for the main course.
